travelAgencyModel

Class Bus

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelAgencyModel.Bus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class containing the most basic information about a bus, such as make, model, license plate and passenger capacity. Implements Serializable
    Author:
    Afonso
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Four argument constructor which accepts the make, model, license plate and passenger capacity of the bus.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bus

        public Bus(java.lang.String make,
           java.lang.String model,
           java.lang.String licensePlate,
           int maxCapacity)
        Four argument constructor which accepts the make, model, license plate and passenger capacity of the bus.
        Parameters:
        make - The manufacturer of the bus.
        model - The model name.
        licensePlate - The vehicle license plate.
        maxCapacity - The passenger capacity of the bus.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Bus other)
        Equals method that determines if the two instances of Bus are perceived to be equal.
        Parameters:
        other - The other Bus to compare against.
        Returns:
        Returns true if both of the buses licensePlate are not null and their licensePlate are equal. (equals method returns true)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        ToString method that returns a concatenation of make, model, licensePlate and maxCapacity. In the special condition that model, licensePlate and maxCapacity are null, make is returned.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
